metadata.title: CVE-2019-18978 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the rack-cors (aka Rack CORS Middleware) gembefore 1.0.4 for Ruby. It allows ../ directory traversal to access privateresources because resource matching does not ensure that pathnames are in acanonical format.

criterions.comment: ruby-rack-cors: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
